name: Chart Industries, Inc.
description: Chart Industries, Inc. is a leading global manufacturer of highly engineered equipment for the production, storage, and end-use of liquefied gases. Founded in 1992, Chart has established itself as a pioneer in cryogenics and is at the forefront of the energy transition, focusing on clean and renewable energy technologies. The company's product portfolio includes a wide array of solutions for the industrial gas, LNG, and hydrogen markets, providing advanced systems that facilitate the energy transformation process. Chart's innovative technologies support the storage and distribution of liquefied natural gas (LNG) and hydrogen, helping industries meet their sustainability goals while enhancing operational efficiency. In addition to its core offerings, Chart also specializes in medical gas equipment, serving the healthcare sector with reliable and safe solutions. With a commitment to innovation and sustainability, Chart Industries continues to expand its global footprint while addressing the growing demand for cleaner energy solutions. The company actively invests in research and development to enhance its product offerings and maintain its competitive edge in the rapidly evolving energy landscape.

faq.answer: Chart Industries' main products include cryogenic storage tanks, LNG vaporization systems, gas compressors, and medical gas systems.
